mutants.code:
def reverse_non_repeated(s):
    s = s.replace('', '')
    unique_chars = [c for c in s if s.count(c) == 1]
    result = ''.join(reversed(unique_chars))
    return result

def reverse_non_repeated(s):
    s = s.replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    unique_chars = [c for c in s if s.count(c) == 1]
    result = ''.join(reversed(unique_chars))
    return result

def reverse_non_repeated(s):
    s = s.replace(' ', '')
    unique_chars = [c for c in s if s.count(c) == -1]
    result = ''.join(reversed(unique_chars))
    return result
